topics.body: Well shit; that Ebola breakout in africa is out of control and they can't contain it. . . This is probably going to end very badly.

topics.body: Nothing good is coming from Africa ever.

"@SeraphimDawn":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53a4a18c6368726dd61f0200#post_53a4a18c6368726dd61f0200

What we need is a Crime-Horror video game in Hong Kong. Or at least the Kowloon Walled City. Sort of like "Condemned: Criminal Origins":https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLrekaHLD2rhZRkubQNmmw1ndoZt-sNapr, but with more Chinese cops, British-owned Hong Kong, and justified, creepy interiors.

topics.body:
"@Ore-O":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/53a4aad46368724664370100#post_53a4aad46368724664370100
Bye Africa; been nice knowing you.  In all seriousness it's been predicted for years that eventually something like this would happen.  Countries with little to no sanitary conditions are extremely vulnerable to outbreaks.  Considering that they can't contain it's probably going to seriously fuck up a couple countries before they finally get it contained.
